unifal.title: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
unifal.institution: Universidade Federal de Alfenas, Alfenas, Brazil.

exportadora.title: Junior Fullstack Developer
exportadora.description:
Mobile/web front-end development using React, Next.js, and Flutter.
Back-end development using PHP and SQL Server.
Development of customizations for the TOTVS Protheus ERP system using AdvPl and SQL Server.

progepe.title: Web Design/Graphic Design Intern
progepe.description:
Design of web pages using Wordpress.
Image editing and creation using Photoshop and vectorial drawing software.

tribit.title: Front-end Developer
tribit.description: Front-end development using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Ionic and Firebase.

python.title: Python A-Z™: Python For Data Science
python.description: Python for data analysis and data science.

r.title: R Programming A-Z™: Python For Data Science
r.description: R for data analysis and data science.

machineLearning.title: Machine Learning A-Z™
machineLearning.description: Machine learning full course with Python and R.

eudr_next.description: Environmental Compliance Platform Frontend, made with Next.js 14, MUI, and Tailwind CSS. Internationalization made with next-intl.

mediawiki_pybot.description: Command-line utility for performing mass edits on wikis using the MediaWiki API. Made with Python, inspired by AutoWikiBrowser.

block_game_next.description: Tetris clone made with React/Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

JSMP-Notebooks.description: Code used for exploring machine learning and deep learning techniques using data from the machine learning competition "Jane Street Market Prediction".

chess_java.description: Terminal-based chess game made with Java.

ssg_i18n_next.description: Next.js 14 Starter SSG project with client-side locale detection and internationalization with next-intl.

dashboard_flutter.description: A responsive web dashboard with sidemenu and routing, made with Flutter Web.

routesapp_flutter.description: Routes visualization with Google Maps and existing coordinates.

starcount_mpi_c.description: Program written in C that counts stars in astronomical images using parallelism with MPI.
